title: When you climp out of bronze

replies.body:
Welcome to silver, now you will realize that nothing is more toxic than a silver IV player that was gold II a month ago.

Not only are they shit, they are also entitled, elitist, and so, so much better than anyone else. And permanently mad at the hackers, trolls, leavers, people like you, ect that made them loose their deserved rank.

> [{quoted}](name=MagicFlyingLlama,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=mxjNgwLn,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-07-23T20:07:34.555+0000)
>
> Welcome to silver, now you will realize that nothing is more toxic than a silver IV player that was gold II a month ago.
> 
> Not only are they shit, they are also entitled, elitist, and so, so much better than anyone else. And permanently mad at the hackers, trolls, leavers, people like you, ect that made them loose their deserved rank.

I am silver 2, but it isn't so bad there than what it was in bronze. (I was demoted to bronze 3 due to season 6.) What do you mean by the "people like you?"

"People like you" includes anyone who is not the salty person looking for an excuse to rage, blame or flame.

Since they are not that person, obviously they did something wrong or are just horribly flawed, meaning it morally ok to rage at them like a 12-year-old that just discovered that their mommy is not keylogging them.

Basic league stuff, really.
I just got to silver, (again). I'm happy to be back, the community is so much better.
